title: A permanent vent shall be provided at the top of the service shaft of cross-sectional area not less than 460 sq
clause_text: A permanent vent shall be provided at the top of the service shaft of cross-sectional area not less than 460 sq. cm or 6.25 cm. for each 900-sq. cm of the area of the shaft, whichever is more.

source_pdf.text_snippet: A permanent vent shall be provided at the top of the service shaft of cross-sectional area not less than 460 sq. cm or 6.25 cm. for each 900-sq. cm of the area of the shaft, whichever is more.
